thread.title: WATCH: Vincent Kompany Knows His NFL Logos Ahead of Super Bowl
thread.title_full: WATCH: Vincent Kompany Knows His NFL Logos Ahead of Super Bowl

title: WATCH: Vincent Kompany Knows His NFL Logos Ahead of Super Bowl
text:
WATCH: Vincent Kompany Knows His NFL Logos Ahead of Super Bowl Sat Feb 04 2017 20:45:39   20:45:39 GMT+0000 (GMT) TheSPORTbible football 
Vincent Kompany definitely knows his NFL logos ahead of the Super Bowl tomorrow night. 
The Manchester City captain has been involved in some of his club's American football content this week as they join in the build-up to the big game between the New England Patriots and Atlanta Falcons in Houston. 
He reacted to some big NFL hits yesterday and has followed that up by trying to name as many NFL logos as he possibly can today. 
And Kompany did a pretty good job, naming 16 correctly in 80 seconds while taking advantage of three six-second timeouts. 
He starts off slightly ropey, confusing the San Francisco 49ers for the San Francisco Giants baseball team, but he settles to put in a steady performance: 
Kompany should be tuning in when the big game kicks off at NRG Stadium tomorrow night at 11.30pm. 
The Patriots are aiming for their fifth Super Bowl victory with a win tomorrow night, while the Falcons are looking for their first in franchise history.
